item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://linguainkmedia.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitors IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Lingua Ink Media
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
FACEBOOK INSTAGRAM LINKEDIN

Strategic Content for Creative Minds

S. Bairey

  • You Need Clear Branding

    Unify your brand so customers connect with your unique value instantly.

  • You Need Online Presence

    Elevate your site and socials so your strengths shine everywhere customers find you.

  • You Need Smart Strategy

    Focus your marketing so every effort multiplies results and accelerates growth.

  • You Need Founder Support

    Streamline your workflows so you gain time while leading with impact.

Lingua Ink Media

Proven Marketing That Balances
Strategy and Story

Lingua Ink

From Fortune 50 systems to startup brands, Steph Bairey applies big-league marketing rigor with a creative human touch.

  • Proven at Scale

    Guiding marketing and editorial strategies trusted by global audiences.

  • Agile for Growth

    Helping startups and firms sharpen their brand, websites, and campaigns.

  • Creative & Credible

    Trusted by professionals, creators, and entrepreneurs.

WHAT DO OUR CLIENTS SAY?

Lingua Ink clarified our brand story and boosted LinkedIn engagement threefold.

Jonah Reyes

Executive Director, Meridian Creative Labs

Steph and Lingua Ink transformed our content into a clear strategy. Newsletter opens doubled and we finally look consistent online.

Elena Park

Co-Founder & COO, Bluebridge Labs

Our cohort launch sold out thanks to Lingua Inks campaign plan and marketing support.

Priya Anand

Program Director, Hearth & Story Studio

Their SEO audit gave us quick wins. Search traffic jumped and new client calls followed within weeks.

Marcus Hale

Managing Partner, Northfield Legal

From foundation to growth

Your Marketing, Made Simple

  • Brand & Messaging

    Say what you mean. Mean what you say. Most businesses know what

  • Website & SEO

    Your site should do the explaining, so you don't have to. A

  • Strategy & Playbooks

    A plan you'll actually follow. Most organizations don't lack ideas. They lack

  • Website Development

    Built for clarity, not complexity. We build websites on WordPress for small

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
About Lingua Ink Media

Get to Know Us

Lingua Ink Media is a content and strategy consultancy for small businesses, startups, and mission-driven organizations. We listen, we ask questions, and we turn complexity into clarity.

Founded by Steph Bairey, Lingua Ink Media draws on three decades of experience in digital communications. We work as advisors and collaborators.

We provide honest guidance.

Contact Us

#Happy Clients

Customer Feedback

Our Clients Say

Lingua Ink clarified our brand story and boosted LinkedIn engagement threefold.

Jonah Reyes

Executive Director, Meridian Creative Labs

Steph and Lingua Ink transformed our content into a clear strategy. Newsletter opens doubled and we finally look consistent online.

Elena Park

Co-Founder & COO, Bluebridge Labs

Our cohort launch sold out thanks to Lingua Inks campaign plan and marketing support.

Priya Anand

Program Director, Hearth & Story Studio

Their SEO audit gave us quick wins. Search traffic jumped and new client calls followed within weeks.

Marcus Hale

Managing Partner, Northfield Legal

What We Bring

Turning complexity into clarity

  • Editorial Rigor

  • Strategic Focus

Three decades of experience in global communications. We know what works because we've done the work.

We help you say what you mean.

Most businesses understand their own value. The challenge is translating that understanding into language that resonates with the people you're trying to reach. We work with you to develop messaging that's specific, grounded, and useful across every channel you touch.

We build systems, not dependencies.

Our goal is to make ourselves less necessary over time. That means deliverables you can own and maintain: documented strategies, templates, training, and processes designed for your real capacity. You shouldn't need to call us every time you want to update your website or send a newsletter.

We stay in our lane.

We're good at content, messaging, websites, and marketing strategy. We're not a full-service agency and we don't pretend to be. When you need something outside our expertise (paid media, PR, video production), we'll say so and help you find the right partner.

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://miboozwp.pixydrops.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Brand & Messaging
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
Say what you mean. Mean what you say.

Most businesses know what they do. The challenge is explaining it in a way that sticks: to clients, to partners, to the person reading your website at 11 p.m. on their phone. We help you find the language that fits. Clear, honest, and distinctly yours. Brand and messaging work starts with listening. We'll ask about the people you serve, the problems you solve, and the way you think about your work when you're not performing for an audience. From there, we develop core messaging: your positioning, your voice, and the language you'll return to again and again. The goal is a framework you can actually use, one that makes writing emails, updating your website, or briefing a designer easier, not harder.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:3:{i:0;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:46:"What does "messaging framework" actually mean?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:239:"A set of building blocks: your core positioning statement, a few key messages for different audiences, and guidelines for tone. Think of it as a reference document that saves you from reinventing the wheel every time you write something. ";}i:1;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:24:"How long does this take?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:226:"Typically four to six weeks, depending on how much material we're working with and how quickly you can schedule conversations. We don't rush this work. Getting the language right takes thought, but we also don't drag it out. ";}i:2;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:36:"Do you write copy, or just strategy?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:211:"Both, depending on what you need. Some clients want a messaging framework they can hand to their team. Others want us to apply it across their website, emails, or marketing materials. We're happy to do either. ";}}

item.title: Website & SEO
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
Your site should do the explaining, so you don't have to.

A good website answers questions before they're asked. It tells visitors who you are, what you offer, and whether you're the right fit. Quickly, without clutter or confusion. We help you get there, whether you need a content refresh, a structural overhaul, or just someone to look at your site with fresh eyes and tell you what's working and what isn't. We approach websites editorially. That means looking at the whole experience: how pages are organized, what the copy says (and doesn't say), whether the navigation makes sense, and how search engines see your content. We'll audit what you have, recommend what needs to change, and either implement those changes ourselves or hand off clear direction to your developer or team.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:3:{i:0;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:35:"What's included in a website audit?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:227:"A thorough review of your site's structure, content, and search performance, along with a prioritized list of recommendations. We focus on what will actually make a difference, not a hundred-item checklist for the sake of it. ";}i:1;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:22:"Can you help with SEO?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:253:"Yes. We look at keyword strategy, page structure, meta content, and site performance as part of any website engagement. We won't promise page-one rankings (no one honest will), but we can improve how search engines understand and surface your content. ";}i:2;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:43:"What if I just need copy, not a full audit?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:197:"That's fine. We can write or rewrite specific pages (About, Services, landing pages) without a full-scale engagement. We'll still want to understand the context, but we can scope the work to fit. ";}}

item.title: Strategy & Playbooks
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
A plan you'll actually follow.

Most organizations don't lack ideas. They lack a clear picture of which ideas matter, in what order, with what resources. Strategy work is about making those decisions, writing them down, and giving you something you can return to when things get busy and priorities get blurry. We develop marketing playbooks built around your real capacitynot a hypothetical version of your business with unlimited time and budget. We look at where your audience is, what they respond to, and where you can realistically show up. The deliverable is a documented plan: goals, channels, cadence, and the specific actions that support them. Not theory. Not aspirations. A working plan.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:3:{i:0;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:56:"What's the difference between a strategy and a playbook?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:251:"Strategy is the thinking: where you focus, who you're reaching, and what success looks like. A playbook is the execution layer: what you're doing, when, and how. We typically deliver both together, because strategy without action is just a document. ";}i:1;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:52:"How involved do you stay after the playbook is done?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:165:"That's up to you. Some clients take the plan and run with it. Others want ongoing check-ins or help executing specific pieces. We can structure either arrangement. ";}i:2;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:52:"What if my business changes midway through the plan?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:126:"Plans should flex. We design playbooks with room to adjust, and we're happy to revisit and revise as your situation evolves. ";}}

item.title: Website Development
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
Built for clarity, not complexity.

We build websites on WordPress for small businesses and organizations that need something professional, functional, and easy to maintain. Our sites are designed to load fast, look clean, and let you update content without calling for help every time. We handle the whole process: site architecture, design, development, and migration. We also do the editorial work alongside the technical build, so you're not launching a beautiful site with placeholder copy. The result is something you can hand off to your team (or keep running yourself) without ongoing dependence on developers.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:3:{i:0;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:30:"What if I already have a site?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:171:"We can redesign and rebuild on WordPress, or work within your existing setup if it makes sense. We'll assess what you have and recommend the most practical path forward. ";}i:1;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:41:"Will I be able to update the site myself?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:139:"Yes. We build with that in mind. You'll get training on how to make basic edits, and we'll document anything you need to reference later. ";}i:2;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:31:"We Help to Achieve Mutual Goals";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:209:"There are many variations of passages the majority have suffered alteration in some fo injected humour, simply free text available in the market of loram ipsum where it is not or randomised words believable. item.title: Social Marketing
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
Showing up consistently, without burning out.

Social media is a presence game. You don't need to be everywhere or post constantly, but you do need to be intentional about where you show up and what you say when you do. We help you figure out the right mix, create content that reflects your voice, and build systems so it doesn't take over your week. We develop social strategies grounded in what's sustainable for your business. That might mean a focused presence on one or two platforms, a content calendar you can maintain, or a batch-production approach that gives you weeks of posts in advance. We can handle production, or we can set you up with templates and processes to do it yourself.

item.title: Content Writing
item.dc:creator: limadmin
item.content:encoded:
Words that work, without the fuss.

You know what you want to say. Getting it onto the page in a form that's clear, polished, and sounds like you is the hard part. We write content for businesses that need a capable hand with the actual prose: blog posts, case studies, newsletters, white papers, website copy. The kind of writing that supports your work without demanding all your time. We write as collaborators, not ghostwriters who disappear into a vacuum. That means conversations up front about your audience, your goals, and your voice. It means drafts you can respond to honestly, and revisions that reflect your feedback. The finished product should feel like yours, because it is. We just helped get it there.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:3:{i:0;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:35:"What kinds of content do you write?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:325:"Blog posts and articles, case studies, email sequences, newsletters, white papers, and website copy. If it's prose meant to represent your business, we can probably help. We don't do ad copy or social captions (that falls under Social Marketing), but we're happy to point you in the right direction if that's what you need. ";}i:1;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:26:"How does the process work?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:337:"We start with a brief conversation or intake form to understand the piece: audience, purpose, key points, tone. Then we draft. You review, we revise. Most pieces go through one or two revision rounds before they're final. Turnaround depends on length and complexity, but a typical blog post takes about a week from kickoff to delivery. ";}i:2;a:2:{s:24:"mibooz_service_faq_title";s:33:"Can you match our existing voice?";s:26:"mibooz_service_faq_content";s:211:"Yes. We'll review samples of your previous writing or marketing materials to get a feel for how you communicate. If you don't have much to share, we'll work with you to define the voice as part of the process. ";}}
